core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: The Stored Transaction is removed by the RecallTransaction action, we should fail actions after the RecallTransaction action unless we are writing back the Stored Transaction. Adding a simple item (recall item) to the basket should never fail, therefore ignore the fail outcome.

core:outcomeLink.core:condition: notEmpty(process.endpointReference) and ((notEmpty(process.transactionId) and length(process.transactionId) == 26) or (notEmpty(process.scannedTransactionId) and length(process.scannedTransactionId) == 26) or (notEmpty(process.key)))
